languages.text: "Думала ли я, что встречу здесь то же, что видела на Крударахе?" {n}Ирлиэт печально смеется.{/n} "Закостенелые, не имеющие смысла правила... и осуждение за переступание этих мертвых границ. То, что так тяготило меня. Когда-то".

"Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."
languages.original_text: "Думала ли я, что встречу здесь то же, что видела на Крударахе?" {n}Ирлиэт печально смеется.{/n} "Закостенелые, не имеющие смысла правила... и осуждение за переступание этих мертвых границ. То, что так тяготило меня. Когда-то".

traits.locale_text: "Have I expected to see the same object I had seen on Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and the condemnation for overstepping these meaningless boundaries. Something that, long ago, had weighted me down so much. Once upon a time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Have I expected to see the same object I had seen on Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and the condemnation for overstepping these meaningless boundaries. Something that, long ago, had weighted me down so much. Once upon a time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我怎么会想到自克鲁达拉赫以后，我还会遇到这样的情况？”{n}伊莉耶特露出一抹苦笑。{/n}“毫无意义的条条框框……因为逾越了某些根本无关紧要的规则而受到谴责。对过去的我而言，这曾是无比沉重的负担，但此时的我已经不同往昔。”
languages.original_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."

traits.locale_text: “我怎么会想到自克鲁达拉赫以后，我还会遇到这样的情况？”{n}伊莉耶特露出一抹苦笑。{/n}“毫无意义的条条框框……因为逾越了某些根本无关紧要的规则而受到谴责。对过去的我而言，这曾是无比沉重的负担，但此时的我已经不同往昔。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No esperaba yo tropezarme otra vez con lo mismo de Crudarach». {n}Yrliet ríe apenada.{/n} «Tantas reglas rigurosas e insignificantes... y tanto reproche por cruzar límites intrascendentes. Antes me pesaba mucho. Antes».
languages.original_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."

traits.locale_text: «No esperaba yo tropezarme otra vez con lo mismo de Crudarach». {n}Yrliet ríe apenada.{/n} «Tantas reglas rigurosas e insignificantes... y tanto reproche por cruzar límites intrascendentes. Antes me pesaba mucho. Antes».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'aurais pas cru être confrontée à cela après Crudarach, {n}dit-elle avec un petit rire triste.{/n} Des règles rigides et dénuées de sens... et des châtiments pour ceux qui transgressent des frontières sans âme. Tout cela était si pesant, autrefois. »
languages.original_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais pas cru être confrontée à cela après Crudarach, {n}dit-elle avec un petit rire triste.{/n} Des règles rigides et dénuées de sens... et des châtiments pour ceux qui transgressent des frontières sans âme. Tout cela était si pesant, autrefois. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass mir so etwas nach Crudarach jemals wieder begegnet." {n}Yrliet lacht traurig.{/n} "Strikte, sinnlose Regeln ... und Verurteilung beim Übertreten lebloser Grenzen. Das hat mich immer sehr belastet. Damals."
languages.original_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass mir so etwas nach Crudarach jemals wieder begegnet." {n}Yrliet lacht traurig.{/n} "Strikte, sinnlose Regeln ... und Verurteilung beim Übertreten lebloser Grenzen. Das hat mich immer sehr belastet. Damals."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「クルダラの後、またこんなことに出くわすとは思ってもみなかった」{n}ユリエットは悲しげに笑う。{/n}「堅苦しくて無意味な規則…そして命に関わる境界線を踏み越えたことへの非難。それが我にはとても重かった。あの頃は」
languages.original_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラの後、またこんなことに出くわすとは思ってもみなかった」{n}ユリエットは悲しげに笑う。{/n}「堅苦しくて無意味な規則…そして命に関わる境界線を踏み越えたことへの非難。それが我にはとても重かった。あの頃は」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach'tan sonra böyle bir şeyle karşılaşacağım hiç aklıma gelir miydi?" {n}Yrliet kederle gülüyor.{/n} "Katı, anlamsız kurallar... Cansız sınırları aştığım için ayıplanmak... O zamanlar çok ağırıma giderdi."
languages.original_text: "Did I ever think I would encounter this again after Crudarach?" {n}Yrliet laughs sorrowfully.{/n} "Stiff, meaningless rules... and condemnation for overstepping lifeless boundaries. It weighed so heavily upon me. Back then."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach'tan sonra böyle bir şeyle karşılaşacağım hiç aklıma gelir miydi?" {n}Yrliet kederle gülüyor.{/n} "Katı, anlamsız kurallar... Cansız sınırları aştığım için ayıplanmak... O zamanlar çok ağırıma giderdi."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
